Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory90.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The field survey mission is divided into several stages. We will need to make several trips, and even need to stay overnight in the wilds.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the mission began, Rosetta took you to a snowfield some distance from the ARU. Here, you see a vast expanse of snow adorned with several lonely-looking trees.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So I was thinking, you should familiarize yourself with life in the Arctic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I have to survive out here?', 3: '8', 4: "I've read about it before in the files.", 5: '9'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Quick on the draw as always, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That's not the same. True knowledge is acquired by applying them in the field.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So, to better complete our mission... Our first step is to build a fire.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Out in the wild, one's ability to start a fire is the difference between life and death. I'm sure you get the gist, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah.', 3: '13', 4: "Starting a fire isn't that hard.", 5: '14'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Do you really? I'm talking about the primitive way of building a fire.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Obviously, with the help of tools. But Forest Guards prefer to do it the natural way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Generally speaking, other than the basic materials, the Forest Guards gather tinder and firewood from the surrounding area.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At which point, Rosetta begins collecting branches and arranging them into a pile.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Which reminds me, us Forest Guards have a custom for building a fire to welcome newcomers. You aren't exactly wet behind the ears, but let's not pass up the opportunity.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Think you can help me collect firewood, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I have to help in my own welcome party?', 3: '22', 4: "Sure. I'm interested in this welcoming.", 5: '24'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The Forest Guards aren't exactly some easygoing organization. A lot of things you still need to do yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Thanks. It's just another custom of ours. I'm not sure if it'll live up to your expectations, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After searching the area, you find enough firewood to build a fire.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "These branches aren't exactly ideal for firewood, but they should still get the job done.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ensuring the firewood is sufficiently dry, Rosetta clears away a patch of snow. To your puzzlement, Rosetta lets out a sigh of relief at the sight of dirt beneath.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Thankfully, it's not ice underneath...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You weren't expecting ice, were you?", 3: '35', 4: 'Is there normally a lot of ice?', 5: '36'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "No, but that would've been just my luck. Just in case.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No, but it always seems to be the case for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Looks like you might be my lucky charm, Commandant. Had I known this, I would've teamed up with you during the card game.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why were you playing card games with them?', 3: '39', 4: "I don't really know how to play.", 5: '40'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Because it's fun and I like the artwork, of course. But with my luck, I always end up drawing the wrong cards.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "The rules of the game are fairly simple. You'll learn them soon enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Anyway, let's get this fire started first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta fishes out a flint rock and strikes it a few times to light up the lower layer of the firewood.'}
{3: 'The embers slowly grow into a flame as they eat up the firewood, converging into a warm bonfire shortly thereafter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Now it's time for your welcoming.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Once the bonfire is burning at a steady pace, Rosetta gestures you to sit by the fire and slowly leans over.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wha?!', 3: '52', 4: 'Is this... the welcoming?', 5: '53'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Careful, you don't want to kick the bonfire.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yeah, I've never done this for an outsider. Guess I need some more practice.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta takes you by surprise as she approaches, but she does not seem to pay any mind.'}
{3: 'Rosetta continues, inching closer and closer, her breath almost palpable...'}
{3: 'But just then...'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'An earthquake!?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The sudden tremors stop Rosetta in her tracks. Following the direction of the rumbling, you see a giant ten-meter tall snowball rolling your way.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I don't know, but let's get out of here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Roger. Let's over to the trees!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}

{3: 'Thanks to your quick reaction, you and Rosetta avoid disaster. However, the same cannot be said about your hard-earned bonfire which is swept away by the snowball, leaving not so much as a trace.'}
{3: 'Rosetta is taken aback by the strange happening. Shortly after, you hear familiar footsteps—hoofsteps—coming from the direction of the snowball.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Oh? Rosetta and 【kuroname】? What are you two doing here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We were just starting a fire.', 3: '77', 4: 'What are you guys up to?', 5: '81'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Well, I was going to give Commandant a small welcome before the mission began, but I wasn't expecting a snowball to come flying out of nowhere.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "That was probably a snowball we made for building a snowman. It didn't destroy your bonfire... Did it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "The ARU is on holiday today, so I asked some members to build a snowman with me. But I didn't think the snowball would get so big that it'd roll away.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Which is why I'm here, looking for it. Did you see it go by?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It really isn't my lucky day...", 4: '1'}
